(#{item.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.loadSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.loadSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.loadSiteDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.truckId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.truckNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.truckTeamContractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.truckTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.truckTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.loadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.requiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
